General.Name: Kinko Optical Co Ltd
General.Description: Kinko Optical Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, and production of optical components and lens in Taiwan. The company offers digital single-lens reflex cameras; mobile phone lens; projector lens; IoT, automotive, far infrared, and VR/AR/MR lens; and industrial, telescope, and sports cameras. It also provides spherical and aspherical glass lens OEM, and lens ODM services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
